name: HKP-Notebook
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; echo "Installing GHCup..."; curl --proto "=https" --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_NONINTERACTIVE=1 BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_INSTALL_NO_STACK=1 sh; echo "Loading GHCup environment..."; test -f "$HOME/.ghcup/env" && source "$HOME/.ghcup/env"; export PATH="$HOME/.ghcup/bin:$PATH"; echo "Installing GHC (recommended)..."; ghcup install ghc recommended; ghcup set ghc recommended; echo "Installing Cabal (recommended)..."; ghcup install cabal recommended; ghcup set cabal recommended; echo "Haskell setup complete."'
